submission:
from sortedcontainers import SortedList
class Solution:
    def minimumDistance(self, points: List[List[int]]) -> int:
        s1 = SortedList()
        s2 = SortedList()
        for x, y in points:
            s1.add(x - y)
            s2.add(x + y)
        ans = inf
        for x, y in points:
            s1.remove(x - y)
            s2.remove(x + y)
            ans = min(ans, max(s1[-1] - s1[0], s2[-1] - s2[0]))
            s1.add(x - y)
            s2.add(x + y)
        return ans
